title: Next Champions that need a rework
body:
So far this season has been year reworks of old champions like swain, irelia, aatrox, nunu and more, and so far riot has done really great so I was wondering if there are any other champions that should get a full rework

Like pantheon who is so old and basic that 3 of abilities are just point and click, his base skin reminds of Nintendo 64 graphics so at least a visual update for him. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: Well guys Mordekaiser {{champion:82}} is the next in line for rework now. So who might be next? Pantheon {{champion:80}} ?

I would love to see {{champion:30}} {{champion:27}} reworked so they can get some form of early game effectiveness. You can't really play either of these champs without getting pushed out by the more modern "we have no downsides" champions. Neither of them have aged well, and they need to be fixed.

Easily {{champion:82}} 

Honestly I'm still trying to figure out why Nunu got a rework before him
Definitely {{champion:82}},  he's the most archaic, binary champ in the game
